description: Resource Type definition for SSO PermissionSet

Tag.description: The metadata that you apply to the permission set to help you categorize and organize them.

Name.description: The name you want to assign to this permission set.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name you want to assign to this permission set.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 32  

Pattern: [\w+=,.@-]+  

Update requires: No interruption

PermissionSetArn.description: The permission set that the policy will be attached to
PermissionSetArn.markdownDescription:
The permission set that the policy will be attached to

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 10  

Maximum Length: 1224  

Pattern: arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):sso:::permissionSet/(sso)?ins-[a-zA-Z0-9-.]{16}/ps-[a-zA-Z0-9-./]{16}  

Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
The permission set description.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 700  

Pattern: [\u0009\u000A\u000D\u0020-\u007E\u00A1-\u00FF]*  

Update requires: No interruption

InstanceArn.description: The sso instance arn that the permission set is owned.
InstanceArn.markdownDescription:
The sso instance arn that the permission set is owned.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 10  

Maximum Length: 1224  

Pattern: arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):sso:::instance/(sso)?ins-[a-zA-Z0-9-.]{16}  

Update requires: No interruption

SessionDuration.description: The length of time that a user can be signed in to an AWS account.
SessionDuration.markdownDescription:
The length of time that a user can be signed in to an AWS account.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 100  

Pattern: ^(-?)P(?=\d|T\d)(?:(\d+)Y)?(?:(\d+)M)?(?:(\d+)([DW]))?(?:T(?:(\d+)H)?(?:(\d+)M)?(?:(\d+(?:\.\d+)?)S)?)?$  

Update requires: No interruption

RelayStateType.description: The relay state URL that redirect links to any service in the AWS Management Console.
RelayStateType.markdownDescription:
The relay state URL that redirect links to any service in the AWS Management Console.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 240  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9&$@#\/%?=~\-_'"|!:,.;*+\[\]\ \(\)\{\}]+  

Update requires: No interruption

ManagedPolicies.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

InlinePolicy.description: The inline policy to put in permission set.
InlinePolicy.markdownDescription:
The inline policy to put in permission set.

---

Required: No

Type: ['object', 'string']     

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

CustomerManagedPolicyReferences.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

PermissionsBoundary.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption
